amendment.description: To appropriate amounts for the Executive Office for Immigration Review, U.S. Customs and Border Protection, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, the Federal Emergency Management Agency, U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services, refugee and entrant assistance, and other Federal agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6621, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 87. Record Vote Number: 412.

action.text: Amendment SA 6621 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Sinema to Amendment SA 6552. (consideration: CR S10068; text: CR S10062-10063) To appropriate amounts for the Executive Office for Immigration Review, U.S. Customs and Border Protection, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, the Federal Emergency Management Agency, U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services, refugee and entrant assistance, and other Federal agencies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6621 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Sinema to Amendment SA 6552.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 6621, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 87. Record Vote Number: 412.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6621, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 87. Record Vote Number: 412.
